name: LGND 2
description:
With a pistol with a grappling attachment, some broken physics and maybe a bit of luck, can you reach it to the end without literally being blown to pieces for a second time?

Welcome to LGND 2.

LGND 2 is an 3D run-and-gun that involves exploring a level and killing all enemies inside and destroying the end goal.

The game is designed to be fast paced, with you moving from position to position to avoid your location getting overrun by enemies
